title: The Mystery at Pictured Rocks
description: In this Dateline classic, a hard-working couple cherished the chance to get away from it all. But what happened on one hiking trip stunned everyone, and left police thinking there was just one explanation. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on June 29, 2008.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
